attributes.title: Constant lag
attributes.review: This app has immense lag, it is constantly freezing and kicking me back to the home screen. Not only that, this app has some sort of bug that causes it to spread false information, the text is constantly warping to have horrific spelling mistakes. This app overall is terrible. Don‚Äôt get it!!!! This app should be deleted!!!!!

attributes.title: The cover almost killed my grandma
attributes.review: I showed my grandma the app in excitement and she started seizing at the colors and picture of Trump when I first opened the app. We had to bring her to the hospital. When we got to the hospital the nurses and staff said that they have gotten so many new cases of seizures and strokes caused by this particular app. If you get this app, you may DIE.
